desc: 戦闘開始から３ターンの間、防御力を５０％アップ

dictionary.lore: There was once a prime minister named Darvanshel in the Sama Kingdom. Despite being a civil officer, to the dismay of his people he always carried a shield. However, one day the King of Sama was attacked by an assasin while out hunting. At that moment, Darvanshel threw himself, together with his shield, in front of the King, saving his life. This was always his shield's purpose.

name: 王盾ダルバンシェル
